Description: Every 1 second or if alarms/status changes

Name: Standby Mode
Description:
1.Standby Mode
Condition: Charge and discharge MOSFETs are open, DC/DC is off.
State: System is idle, waiting for alarms to clear to transition to another state.

Name: Run Mode
Description:
2.Run Mode
Condition: No alarms; MOSFETs are closed.
State: Battery is actively operating normally.

Name: Charge Disabled Mode
Description:
3.Charge Disabled Mode
Condition: Charge MOSFETs are open, DC/DC is off, discharge MOSFETs are closed.
State: Charging is blocked, but discharging is allowed.

Name: Charge DC/DC Mode
Description:
4.Charge DC/DC Mode
Condition: Charge MOSFETs are open and DC/DC is on, discharge MOSFETs are closed.State: Battery is actively charging.

Name: Discharge Disabled Mode
Description:
5.Discharge Disabled Mode
Condition: Discharge MOSFETs are open; charge MOSFETs are closed or DC/DC is running.
State: Discharging is blocked, but charging is allowed.

Name: Emergency Mode
Description:
6.Emergency Mode
Condition:  Charge and discharge MOSFETs are open, DC/DC is off, MCB (Miniature Circuit Breaker) is open (disconnected).
State: System is in critical failure mode, requiring manual intervention.

Name: status
Description: Status bits as a 16 bit bitfield

Name: Heater
Description: 0: output disabled, 1: output enabled. Used for external devices such as lock or heater.

Name: MCB status
Description: 0: MCB is closed, connected, 1: MCB is open, i.e. disconnected
NOTE: This whole 16-bit bitfield need to be adjusted according to actualy implementation

Name: alarms
Description: Alarms bits as a 32 bit bitfield

Name: Cell over temperature charge (COTC)
Description: NOTE: This whole 32-bit bitfield need to be adjusted according to actualy implementation

Name: neg_bat_temp_1_deci_celsius
Description: Negative internal cable joint 1 in deci-Celcius

Name: neg_bat_temp_2_deci_celsius
Description: Negative internal cable joint 2 in deci-Celcius

Name: pos_bat_temp_cb_deci_celsius
Description: Positive internal cable joint in deci-Celcius
At start up and on request

At start up and on request

Name: esp32_mac_address
Description: The MAC address of the ESP32

Name: module_id
Description: Physical position of the battery in bank/stack counting from top.
